mapper.select: SELECT ct.btname ename, IFNULL(m,0) countmoney FROM cusbus_type ct LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.btid, btname,SUM(creceivables) m FROM pay_code p INNER JOIN cusbus_type t ON p.ctype = t.btid WHERE p.ctime LIKE #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY ctype) a ON ct.btid = a.btid ORDER BY countmoney DESC

SELECT d_name dname ,IFNULL(countmoney,0) countmoney FROM department d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.did,d_name dname,SUM(p.creceivables) countmoney FROM pay_code p INNER JOIN empinfo e ON e.eid = p.sale INNER JOIN department d ON d.did = e.did WHERE p.ctime LIKE #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY e.did ) a ON d.did = a.did WHERE d_name LIKE '销售%' ORDER BY countmoney DESC
select month(ctime) ename, sum(creceivables) countmoney from pay_code WHERE year(ctime)= #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by year(ctime),month(ctime) ORDER BY month(ctime)

select btname ename, month(ctime) dname, sum(creceivables) money from pay_code p INNER JOIN cusbus_type t ON p.ctype = t.btid WHERE btname = #{cremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR } AND year(ctime) = #{ctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR } group by year(ctime), month(ctime),ctype ORDER BY month(ctime)

SELECT pay_code.cid,customerinfo.crname crname,pay_code.ctime,empinfo.ename, cusbus_type.btname,cusarea.aname,pay_code.creceivables,pay_code.cremark FROM pay_code INNER JOIN customerinfo ON customerinfo.crid=pay_code.crid INNER JOIN cusarea ON cusarea.aid=pay_code.carea INNER JOIN empinfo ON empinfo.eid=pay_code.sale INNER JOIN cusbus_type ON cusbus_type.btid = pay_code.ctype ORDER BY cid

SELECT pay_code.cid,customerinfo.crname,pay_code.ctime,empinfo.ename, cusbus_type.btname,cusarea.aname,pay_code.creceivables,pay_code.cremark FROM pay_code INNER JOIN customerinfo ON customerinfo.crid=pay_code.crid INNER JOIN cusarea ON cusarea.aid=pay_code.carea INNER JOIN empinfo ON empinfo.eid=pay_code.sale INNER JOIN cusbus_type ON cusbus_type.btid = pay_code.ctype where cid=#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.cid,a.crid,a.ctime,a.sale,a.ctype,a.carea,a.creceivables,a.countmoney,e.ename,t.btname,ar.aname, c.crname FROM (SELECT p1.cid,p1.crid,p1.ctime,p1.sale,p1.ctype,p1.carea,p1.creceivables,IFNULL(p2.countmoney,0) countmoney FROM pay_code p1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(prpaymoney) countmoney, prpaycode FROM pay_record GROUP BY prpaycode )p2 ON p1.cid = p2.prpaycode ) a INNER JOIN customerinfo c ON c.crid=a.crid INNER JOIN empinfo e ON e.eid = a.sale INNER JOIN cusbus_type t on t.btid = a.ctype INNER JOIN cusarea ar on ar.aid = a.carea WHERE a.creceivables >a.countmoney or a.countmoney is null

SELECT cid ,p.crid, ctime,sale, ctype,carea, creceivables ,p. syid ,btname,aname,syname,stuition , crname,crsex,crschool, crmajor,crtel,cronline ,summoney FROM ( SELECT cid,crid,ctime,sale,ctype,carea,creceivables,substring_index(cremark,'!',1) syid FROM pay_code ) p INNER JOIN cusbus_type bt ON bt.btid = p.ctype INNER JOIN cusarea ca ON ca.aid= p.carea INNER JOIN studydirection sd ON sd.syid = p.syid INNER JOIN customerinfo cr ON cr.crid = p.crid INNER JOIN (SELECT prpaycode ,SUM(prpaymoney) summoney FROM pay_record GROUP BY prpaycode ) pp ON pp.prpaycode = p.cid WHERE cronline =3
